description: Retrieves a paginated list of assets associated with an IoT SiteWise Monitor project.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return for each paginated request. Default: 50

nested_items.name: assetIds
nested_items.description: A list that contains the IDs of each asset associated with the project.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results, or null if there are no additional results.
